import { func } from "prop-types"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import {Routes, Route, Link, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import './employeeform.css' import './form.css' import checkbox from './checkbox.js' import input from './input.js' import choice from "./dropdown"; import EmployeeList from "./employeelist"; const role = [ {value: 1, text: "Sửa chữa"}, {value: 2, text: "Vệ sinh"}, {value: 3, text: "Sửa chữa"} ] const position = [ {value: 1, text: "Sửa chữa"}, {value: 2, text: "Vệ sinh"}, {value: 3, text: "Sửa chữa"} ] const workday = [ {value: 1, text: "Thứ hai"}, {value: 2, text: "Thứ ba"}, {value: 3, text: "Thứ tư"}, {value: 4, text: "Thứ năm"}, {value: 5, text: "Thứ sáu"}, {value: 6, text: "Thứ bảy"}, {value: 7, text: "Chủ nhật"} ] function Main (){ const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleClick = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); navigate('/apartmentlist'); } return(
